get.desc: Lists the MongoDB collection under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

200.desc: The MongoDB collection properties were retrieved successfully.

get.desc: Lists the MongoDB databases under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

200.desc: The MongoDB database properties were retrieved successfully.

delete.desc: Deletes an existing Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB Collection.

202.desc: The MongoDB collection delete operation will complete asynchronously.

204.desc: The MongoDB collection delete operation was completed successfully.

delete.desc: Deletes an existing Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB database.

202.desc: The MongoDB database delete operation will complete asynchronously.

204.desc: The MongoDB database delete operation was completed successfully.
